Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. -- 4.03 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Pointe Coupee, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), be authorized to levy a four and three hundredths (4.03) mills tax (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $1,965,000) on all the property subject to taxation within the Parish for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2021 and ending 2030, for the purpose of maintaining and supporting the Pointe Coupee Parish Library and its branches?
